src:
【精彩推薦】四中全會公報泄密？/潘石屹也要跑？

01 Nov 2019, 09:42

【新唐人北京時間2019年11月01日訊】新唐人為讀者推薦每日精彩文章和視頻節目：
【直播預告】川普將參加密西西比助選集會（中文同聲翻譯）美國總統川普將於週五（11月1日）參加密西西比州的圖珀洛（Tupelo）集會，為共和黨州長提名的泰特‧里夫斯（Tate Reeves）助選。新唐人電視台和《大紀元時報》將進行全程追蹤和網絡直播，並有同聲翻譯。請鎖定新聞直播間。
同情示威者 香港政務司官員參與集會被捕自香港反送中運動以來，屢屢曝出香港警察以及公職人員因同情示威者，參與反送中。10月31日晚，多家港媒報導「香港政務司司長辦公室一名男助理文書主任，於當晚在旺角涉嫌參與集會而遭警方拘捕。
習近平力推區塊鏈 專家：又一個「水變油」騙局习近平近日大力提倡区块链，引發輿論高度關注，中國股市中與区块链相關的科技股也一度暴漲，但隨即開始暴跌。有專家對区块链火爆現象進行深度分析，指區塊鏈炒作只不過是又一個「水變油」騙局。
四中全會公報泄密？分析：習受到了問責中共四中全會閉幕後，官方發表的公報中，鋪天蓋地歌頌其黨的領導，似乎在宣示習近平仍大權在握。但有專家分析認為，習至少在兩個問題上面臨黨內壓力。也有不多的觀察者認為，習在全會上受到了問責。
四中全會為何不見接班人？專家揭內幕中共十九屆四中全會10月31日落幕後，全會公報出爐。但並沒出現外界關注的有關增補兩名中共政治局常委，或確定習近平接班人的內容。對此，有專家披露，全會表面上看起來風平浪靜，但背後暗流洶湧。
潘石屹「看事不好」也要跑？網友：絕頂聰明潘石屹清倉SOHO中國的消息曝光後，震驚大陸。目前中國經濟現狀堪憂，房地產市場未來可能出現塌方危機。有網友感嘆，「潘石屹絕對是個聰明人，誰能先跑一秒鐘就多一分活下來的希望！」
英39屍案的背後秘密 中國成偷渡轉運站英國埃塞克斯郡貨櫃車慘案，震驚國際。英國警方最初稱，39名死者全為中國人，後來又有消息稱大部分來自越南，目前死者國籍仍在鑑定中。據20名死者身上被查出假中國護照，有研究員稱，中國成偷渡客的轉運站且是跨國人口販賣罪案溫床。
英39屍案的背後秘密 中國成偷渡轉運站英國埃塞克斯郡貨櫃車慘案，震驚國際。英國警方最初稱，39名死者全為中國人，後來又有消息稱大部分來自越南，目前死者國籍仍在鑑定中。據20名死者身上被查出假中國護照，有研究員稱，中國成偷渡客的轉運站且是跨國人口販賣罪案溫床。
四中全會剛結束 胡春華要採取「非常手段」中共十九屆四中全會期間，國新辦10月30日舉行打擊惡意欠薪犯罪新聞發布會，由中共國務院副總理胡春華領導的小組，將在全會結束後開展重要行動，對惡意欠薪的個人和單位採取「非常手段」。
區塊鏈概念股一天半即閃崩 權貴割韭菜無視習近平面子上週日，中共官媒報導了習近平要大力發展區塊鏈技術應用的講話後，次日中國股市有關區塊鏈概念股一度出現百股暴漲，但熱度僅維持一天半即出現大範圍閃崩。專家學者稱，中共權貴借勢「割韭菜」，都懶得再顧及習近平的面子，倒霉的還是普通散戶股民。
中共發布四中全會公報 黨管一切與習核心路線不變10月31日，中共19屆四中全會結束。會議公報「充份肯定」中共政治局的工作，除了既定「黨建」議程外，只遞補了兩個中央委員，確認了對劉士余的處分。但法媒指，會前中紀委動作頻頻，或意味著將有新一輪黨內整肅。
蓬佩奧：中共不等於中國人 專家指戰略信號意義深蓬佩奧週三的講話中，明確指出「中共不等於中國人民」。專家認為，美國政治菁英，近年明確區別中共與中國，是重大的戰略轉變。
大陸專家：非洲豬瘟似照妖鏡 照出官場防疫漏洞非洲豬瘟在中國肆虐，同時對全世界造成嚴重的危害。據中央社報導稱，除了中國的生豬生產佔了全世界一半以上，官方未能即時給予撲殺豬隻的補貼，也是造成防疫失控的原因。有大陸專家認為，非洲豬瘟就像一面「照妖鏡」，照出了中共防疫部門與官員的漏洞。
香港警察被「繳槍」？高層失權內幕曝光香港前中央政策組全職顧問、資深時事評論員劉細良日前對大紀元透露，中共長期滲透香港警察工會，包括青關會內的親共組織花巨資收買警方，港警已變成了中共公安，警隊高層官員被劫持，失去權力。
反送中嚇壞權貴 傳賈慶林雇飛機轉移香港財產香港作為中共權貴階層洗錢、走資的要地，自反送中運動以來，大量資金外逃，已經重挫香港經濟。消息人士披露，中共江派也在加速轉移在港資金，轉移到柬埔寨、新加坡等地，其中江派前常委賈慶林，雇了一架私人飛機把在港財產轉移到柬埔寨。
台師大教授被囚北京1年 150台灣人在大陸失聯台師大國際人力資源發展研究所退休副教授施正屏去年在中國失蹤。現被證實關押在北京，但家屬一直不敢求助。海基會說，已接獲149件台人在大陸失聯案件。專家相信，很多台商面臨此狀況，家屬不敢求援。
福克斯報活摘器官20年噩夢 港人說如夢初醒隨著香港民眾反極權運動的進行，港警不斷公布被民眾稱為「被自殺」的案例，一具具身體剛墜樓就散架的屍體，讓港人回想起十多年前在香港銅鑼灣看到「中共活摘法輪功學員器官」的模擬酷刑展，同時也在全球範圍引起關注。
恐怖！港男問路 突遭港警胡椒噴劑（視頻）10月31日是港警血襲太子站兩個月，同時也是萬聖節。網友當晚發起抗議活動，號召港人戴面具遊行集會。港警則如臨大敵全面戒備。期間一名男子向港警詢問警戒線在那，突遭胡椒噴霧噴眼睛。
組圖：萬聖夜狂歡反送中 港人蘭桂坊「哈囉餵狗官」10月31日萬聖夜，香港市民舉行「哈囉餵狗官面具夜」抗議活動。市民們有的戴著中港高官的頭像面具，或裝扮成各種造型，遊行到聞名世界的中環蘭桂坊酒吧街，舉行狂歡反送中派對，抗議港府強推的《禁蒙面法》，並繼續表達五大訴求。
再推23條信號？四中公報要求香港為「國安」立法中共19屆四中全會31日在北京落幕，會議公報稱「依照憲法和基本法」對港澳「實行管治」，並要求建立特區「維護國家安全的法律」。外界猜測，這可能是在為香港重啟「23條立法」釋放信號。
四中全會剛完 北京放風:懷疑中美能否達長期協議此前中共承諾增購美國農產品和開放金融等，換取美中貿易暫時休戰，並一再釋放談判「誠意」，被指是為「十一」和四中全會的「穩定」。在四中結束當天，就有美媒引述中共官員表示，對美中能否達成長期協議「有懷疑」。
港媒:邊支持邊醞釀 撤換林鄭絕非空穴來風香港《蘋果日報》週四（31日）發表評論文章，指在中共四中全會「如此重要的大會」前，傳出北京可能撤換香港特首林鄭月娥的消息「絕非偶然」，而傳聞中的「替補人選」更未深陷「反送中」風暴漩渦，像這樣切合政治時機及政治需要的換人方案「不可能是憑空揣測」。文章認為，對中共來說，撤換林鄭更是必然趨勢。
智利川習會泡湯北京仍稱樂觀 中美通話或換他國簽協議智利週三宣布取消主辦APEC峰會，美中首腦原定在峰會上簽署「第一階段貿易協議」的計劃遇阻。但中方稱美中談判主將即將再次通話，中共官員也表示樂觀，稱可以換第三國簽署。不過不少外媒仍對協議能否順利簽署持保留態度。
科技冷戰升級 美內政部停飛所有非急用中制無人機出於國家安全的疑慮，美國政府在切斷了中國電信商華為在美國的業務發展後，又開始整頓美國政府機構所擁有的中國製無人機。中國無人機生產商「大疆創新」 週四對外證實，美國內政部已將下令，非必要情況下，停飛所有中國製造或使用中國零件組裝的無人機，等待相關的審查結束。
德國情報局長:華為不可信任 勿讓進入核心領域西方民主國家對華為公司的產品及5G網絡設備的警惕日益強化。有英國媒體週三披露，德國情報據局長坦言，中國網絡裝備商華為不可信任，如果讓華為參與德國新一代移動通信網絡建設，將給德國國家安全帶來風險。

【中國禁聞】10月31日完整版

[Wonderful recommendation] The Fourth Plenary Session is leaked? / Pan Shiyi also want to run?

01 Nov 2019, 09:42

[New Tang Dynasty Beijing time, November 01, 2019] NTDTV recommends daily wonderful articles and video programs for readers:
[Live preview] Trump will participate in the Mississippi-assisted selection meeting (Chinese simultaneous translation) US President Trump will attend the Tupelo rally in Mississippi on Friday (November 1), nominated for the Republican governor Tate Reeves assisted. NTDTV and the Epoch Times will conduct a full-time tracking and webcast, and have simultaneous translations. Please lock the news live room.
Sympathetic Demonstrators Since the Hong Kong Department of Administration officials participated in the rally and arrested from the Hong Kong Anti-Send Movement, they have repeatedly exposed Hong Kong police and public officials to participate in the counter-delivery because of their sympathy for demonstrators. On the evening of October 31, a number of Hong Kong media reported that "a male assistant clerical officer in the Office of the Chief Secretary for Administration in Hong Kong was arrested by the police on suspicion of participating in the rally in Mong Kok that night.
Xi Jinping pushes the blockchain Expert: Another "water-to-oil" scam Xi Jinping has vigorously promoted the blockchain, which has caused public concern. The technology stocks related to the blockchain in China's stock market have also skyrocketed, but then began to plummet. Some experts have conducted an in-depth analysis of the blockchain hot phenomenon, saying that blockchain speculation is just another "water-to-oil" scam.
The Fourth Plenary Session was leaked? Analysis: Xi was criticized After the conclusion of the Fourth Plenary Session of the Chinese Communist Party, in the official communique, the overwhelming praise of his party’s leadership seemed to indicate that Xi Jinping was still in power. However, some experts believe that Xi is facing party pressure on at least two issues. There are also a few observers who believe that Xi was held accountable at the plenary session.
Why did the Fourth Plenary Session not see the successor? Experts unveiled the inside story of the Fourth Plenary Session of the 19th CPC Central Committee on October 31, and the plenary bulletin was released. However, there has not been any concern about the addition of two members of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the Chinese Communist Party or the determination of Xi Jinping’s successor. In response to this, some experts have revealed that the plenary seems to be calm and calm, but behind it.
Pan Shiyi also wants to run "I don't see things well"? Netizen: After the news of the super-clear Pan Shiyi clearance SOHO China was exposed, it shocked the mainland. At present, the current economic situation in China is worrisome, and the real estate market may have a collapse crisis in the future. Some netizens lamented, "Pan Shizhen is definitely a smart person. Who can run for one second and hope for more survival!"
The secret behind the British 39 corpse The Chinese smuggling terminal in the Essex County container truck tragedy, shocked the international. The British police initially claimed that the 39 deceased were all Chinese, and later news that most of them were from Vietnam, and the nationality of the deceased is still being identified. According to the 20 dead people who were found to have fake Chinese passports, some researchers said that China’s transit station for illegal immigrants is a hotbed of crimes for transnational human trafficking.
The secret behind the British 39 corpse The Chinese smuggling terminal in the Essex County container truck tragedy, shocked the international. The British police initially claimed that the 39 deceased were all Chinese, and later news that most of them were from Vietnam, and the nationality of the deceased is still being identified. According to the 20 dead people who were found to have fake Chinese passports, some researchers said that China’s transit station for illegal immigrants is a hotbed of crimes for transnational human trafficking.
The Fourth Plenary Session just ended Hu Chunhua's "extraordinary means" during the Fourth Plenary Session of the 19th CPC Central Committee. The State Council held a press conference on the crime of malicious arrears of wages on October 30. The group led by Vice Premier Hu Chunhua of the State Council, Important actions will be taken after the end of the plenary session, and “very resort” will be adopted for individuals and units that are maliciously in arrears.
Blockchain concept stocks a day and a half, flashing power, cutting amaranth, ignoring Xi Jinping on Sunday, the Chinese Communist Party official media reported that Xi Jinping should vigorously develop the application of blockchain technology, the next day, the Chinese stock market related blockchain concept stocks appeared Hundreds of stocks skyrocketed, but the heat only lasted for a day and a half and there was a wide range of flashes. Experts and scholars said that the CCP’s privilege to take advantage of the trend of “cutting leeks” is too lazy to take into account the face of Xi Jinping, and the unlucky ones are ordinary retail investors.
The CCP issued the communiqué of the Fourth Plenary Session. The party’s core line of management and learning remained unchanged on October 31, and the Fourth Plenary Session of the 19th CPC Central Committee ended. The communique of the meeting was "affirmatively affirmed". Apart from the established "party building" agenda, the work of the Politburo was only supplemented by two Central Committee members and confirmed the punishment of Liu Shiyu. However, the French media said that the Central Disciplinary Committee’s frequent actions before the meeting meant that there would be a new round of party cleanup.
Pompeo: The CCP is not equal to the Chinese. Experts refer to the strategic signal significance. In the speech on Wednesday, he clearly pointed out that "the CCP does not equal the Chinese people." Experts believe that the US political elite has clearly distinguished the CCP and China in recent years and is a major strategic shift.
Continental experts: African pigs look like a demon mirror. The official epidemic prevention loopholes in Africa are raging in China, causing serious harm to the world. According to the Central News Agency, in addition to China's production of pigs accounted for more than half of the world's, the official failed to give immediate subsidies to cull pigs, is also the cause of the outbreak of epidemic prevention. Some mainland experts believe that African swine fever is like a "mirror mirror", which shows the loopholes of the CCP's epidemic prevention departments and officials.
Hong Kong police are being "paid"? High-level dissatisfaction insider exposure Liu Jingliang, a full-time consultant and senior commentator of the former Central Policy Group of Hong Kong, revealed to the Epoch Times that the CCP has long infiltrated the Hong Kong Police Union, including the pro-communist organizations in the Qingguan Association, who spent huge sums of money to buy the police. The Hong Kong police have become The CCP public security, high-ranking police officers were hijacked and lost power.
In the anti-delivery, the power is scared. Jia Qinglin hired a plane to transfer Hong Kong property. Hong Kong, as a place for the CCP’s privileged class to launder money and capital, has plunged Hong Kong’s economy since the reversal of the Chinese movement. According to sources, the Chinese Communist Party is also accelerating the transfer of funds in Hong Kong to Cambodia, Singapore and other places. Among them, Jiang Qinglin, a former member of the Jiang faction, hired a private jet to transfer property in Hong Kong to Cambodia.
Professor of Taiwan Normal University was imprisoned in Beijing for one year 150 Shi Zhengping, a retired associate professor of the Taiwan Institute of Human Resources Development at the Lost Taiwan Normal University, was missing in China last year. He is now confirmed to be detained in Beijing, but his family has been afraid to ask for help. The SEF said that it has received 149 cases of Taiwanese lost in the mainland. Experts believe that many Taiwanese businessmen are facing this situation and their families are afraid to ask for help.
Fox reported that the organ has been harvested for 20 years. The nightmare of the Hong Kong people said that as the dream of the Hong Kong people's anti-totalitarian movement began, the Hong Kong police continued to announce the case that the people called "suicide", a body with a body falling off the building. Let the people of Hong Kong recall the simulated torture exhibition of "the CCP's live harvesting of Falun Gong practitioners" in Causeway Bay, Hong Kong more than 10 years ago. It is also attracting attention on a global scale.
terror! Hong Kong man asked for directions. Hong Kong police pepper spray (video) on October 31 is the Hong Kong police bloody prince station for two months, but also Halloween. Netizens launched a protest that night, calling on Hong Kong people to wear masks and marches. The Hong Kong police are on the verge of full security. During the period, a man asked the Hong Kong police to be on the warning line, and was suddenly sprayed with pepper spray.
Photo: Halloween Carnival Sentences Hong Kong People Lan Kwai Fong "Hello Feeding Dog Officials" On October 31st, Halloween, Hong Kong citizens held a "Hello Feeding Dog Mask Night" protest. Some of the citizens wore masks of high-ranking Chinese and Hong Kong officials, or dressed up in various shapes, marched to the world-famous Lan Kwai Fong Bar Street in Central, and held a carnival reversal party to protest against the Hong Kong government’s forced ban mask. And continue to express the five major demands.
Push 23 more signals? The 4th China Communiqué requires Hong Kong to legislate for "National Security". The Fourth Plenary Session of the 19th CPC Central Committee ended in Beijing on the 31st. The communique of the meeting stated that "governance is governed by Hong Kong and Macao in accordance with the Constitution and the Basic Law" and requires the establishment of the "Protection of National Security Law". . It is speculated that this may be the release of the "23 Legislation" release signal for Hong Kong.
The Fourth Plenary Session just finished Beijing's release: doubting whether China and the United States can reach a long-term agreement, the Chinese Communist Party promised to purchase US agricultural products and open finance, in exchange for a temporary truce in US-China trade, and repeatedly released the "sincerity" of negotiations, alleged to be "11 And the "stability" of the Fourth Plenary Session. On the day of the end of the Fourth, there was a quote from the US media that the Chinese Communist Party officials said that they had "suspicions" about whether the US and China could reach a long-term agreement.
Hong Kong media: Supporting and withdrawing Lin Zheng is not a hole in the wind. Hong Kong's "Apple Daily" published a commentary on Thursday (31st), saying that before the Fourth Plenary Session of the Chinese Communist Party "such an important meeting", it was revealed that Beijing might replace Hong Kong Chief Executive Lin. The message of Zheng Yuejun is "not accidental", and the rumored "substitute candidate" is not caught in the "reverse delivery" storm vortex. The substitution scheme that fits the political timing and political needs "cannot be outdated." The article believes that for the CCP, the removal of Lin Zheng is an inevitable trend.
Chile's Chuan Xihui is still optimistic. Beijing or the United States has announced that it will cancel the hosting of the APEC summit on Wednesday. The US-China summit was scheduled to sign a "first-phase trade agreement" at the summit. However, the Chinese side said that the US-China talks will soon be called again, and the CCP officials also expressed optimism, saying that they can sign for a third country. However, many foreign media still have reservations about whether the agreement can be successfully signed.
The Cold War of Science and Technology upgraded the US Department of the Interior to suspend all non-emergency medium-sized drones for national security concerns. After the US government cut off the business development of Chinese telecoms in China, it began to rectify the Chinese system owned by US government agencies. Drone. China's drone maker "Dajiang Innovation" confirmed on Thursday that the US Department of the Interior has ordered that, unless necessary, all UAVs built or assembled in China will be grounded, waiting for the relevant review to end.
German Intelligence Director: Huawei is not trustworthy. Do not allow the Western democracies to enter the core field. The vigilance of Huawei's products and 5G network equipment is increasingly strengthened. Some British media disclosed on Wednesday that the German intelligence department said frankly that China's network equipment supplier Huawei is untrustworthy. If Huawei is involved in the construction of a new generation of mobile communication networks in Germany, it will bring risks to German national security.
